# didReplaceCharacters()

**Instance Method**

Specifies whether text characters were replaced.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func didReplaceCharacters()
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFinder] for a complete description.

## Replacing Text

- **shouldReplaceCharacters(inRanges:with:)**: Returns whether the specified strings should be replaced.
- **replaceCharacters(in:with:)**: Replaces the text in the specified range with the new string.
